content:
@Richard Kavanagh et al

I'm just reviewing Da Vinci Alerts http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-alerts/Bundle-discharge-notification-message-bundle-01.xml.html
to get an idea of how FHIR ADT notifications could work.

This also overlaps with the high use of HL7v2 ADT_A03 in use with NHS trusts in the UK.

My thoughts: due to high use of A03, this is a constraint and we probably can't convert an A03 into this the fhir example above.

A light weight bundle consisting of Encounter and Patient is probably more practical and would be easier to convert between FHIR Restful, FHIR Message and HL7 v2.
